metadata.description: Network information for the Virtual Machines
The first available IP address in the subnet

variables.wadlogs: <WadCfg> <DiagnosticMonitorConfiguration overallQuotaInMB="4096" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ServiceHosting/2010/10/DiagnosticsConfiguration"> <DiagnosticInfrastructureLogs scheduledTransferLogLevelFilter="Error"/> <WindowsEventLog scheduledTransferPeriod="PT1M" > <DataSource name="Application!*[System[(Level = 1 or Level = 2)]]" /> <DataSource name="Security!*[System[(Level = 1 or Level = 2)]]" /> <DataSource name="System!*[System[(Level = 1 or Level = 2)]]" /></WindowsEventLog>
